instructions: Open your device's Settings app . Tap Accessibility , then tap Select to Speak . Note: If you don't see Select to Speak, go to Google Play to download the latest version of Android Accessibility Suite, then try these steps again. At the top, turn on Select to Speak .

Start Select to Speak: 2-finger swipe up (3-finger swipe if TalkBack is on), or tap the Accessibility button . Learn more about using the Accessibility button or gesture . Tap an item on your screen, like text or an image. To hear multiple items, drag your finger across the screen. To hear everything, tap Play . Tip: When the player is open, use the buttons to pause or play, skip forward or backward, and to increase or decrease speed.

Tap the Google Camera app . Point the camera at an image or text. Start Select to Speak: 2-finger swipe up (3-finger swipe if TalkBack is on), or tap the Accessibility button . Learn more about using the Accessibility button or gesture . Drag your finger across the screen, highlighting the text you want to read.
Open your device's Settings app . Tap Accessibility , then tap Select to Speak . Tap Settings . At the top, turn on Multi-tasking .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google app . At the bottom, tap Collections and then New . Name the collection. Tap Create and then Search for things to add .

On your Android phone or tablet, go to Google.com . If you haven t already, sign in to your Google account. At the top left, tap Menu and then Collections and then New . Name the collection. Tap Create and then Search for things to add .

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google app . At the bottom, tap Collections . Tap the collection you want to open. Under the name of the collection, tap Share . Turn on Sharing . To let others make changes to your collection, select Contributor . To let others view your collection only, select View only .

On your Android phone or tablet, go to Google.com . If you haven t already, sign in to your Google account. At the top left, tap Menu and then Collections . Tap the collection you want to open. Under the name of the collection, tap Share . Turn on Sharing . To let others make changes to your collection, select Contributor . To let others view your collection only, select View only .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google app . At the bottom, tap Collections . Tap the collection you want to open. At the top right, tap More and then Delete and then Delete .

On your Android phone or tablet, go to Google.com . If you haven t already, sign in to your Google account. At the top left, tap Menu and then Collections . Tap the collection you want to open. At the top right, tap More and then Delete and then Delete .
